channel.title: Vagrant on DevOps Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Vagrant on DevOps Engineer

item.title: Vagrant vs. Docker —— Which One Should You Choose?
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article compares Vagrant and Docker, analyzing their respective use cases and advantages to help readers choose the right tool for managing virtual machines or containers.

item.title: What is Vagrant? Differences Between Vagrant and VirtualBox
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article introduces the concept and history of Vagrant, and how to use Vagrant to create and manage virtual machines, emphasizing the advantages of Vagrant over traditional virtual machines.
